entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Petawawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:24 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pembroke 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Temperature: -8.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -9.2°C
Wind: SE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning early this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: Snow changing to a few rain showers and flurries near midnight then to flurries before morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
